title: new champ
body: ok I love dragons and I think  you guys should make a dragon champ pls. the only dragon type is {{champion:102}} and she you can be a dragon maybe 4 times per game. + {{champion:102}} would not be so lonly

replies.body: AO Shin is a champ that has been being made for IDK how long with lots of issues but he is a dragon champ. He was revealed awhile ago but due to issues has been delayed release several times. All the info we have about him can be found here http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ao_Shin
The next dragon champ is [Ao Shin](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Ao_Shin) but he gets seriously delayed every time and as for now, it seems like he won't come out until 2016. :P
